mapper.select: select company_id AS companyId,company_logo as companyLogo,company_name as companyName,count from tb_company where company_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{companyName},'%'))
select company_id AS companyId,company_logo as companyLogo,company_name as companyName,count from tb_company order by count desc limit 0,12
mapper.insert: insert into tb_company (company_id, company_name, company_address, company_logo, count) values (#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update tb_company set company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_address = #{companyAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_logo = #{companyLogo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER} where company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
